attributes.additional_details: Make neurological training compulsory for all teachers and support staff.
attributes.background: My son has gone through mainstream primary school with very little support and understanding about his ADHD/Autism. More training needs to happen for ALL staff teaching techniques to de-escalate and understand sensory, emotional & social needs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638530
Mandatory training for teachers to understand ADHD & autism
